items.displayName: The user wants to manually trigger this workflow to generate a compliance report.
Create the report file path string by concatenating the base path, a formatted current datetime, and the file extension. This will be stored in the strReportPath variable.
Build the structure for the summary DataTable with "Metric" and "Value" columns. This table will hold the summary information.
Add a row to the summary table for "Total Transactions", calculating the value from the count of rows in the in_AllTransactions DataTable.
Add a row to the summary table for "Fraud Detected", using the value from the in_FraudCount argument.
Add a row to the summary table for "Fraud Rate %", calculating the percentage based on fraud count and total transactions.
Add a row to the summary table for "Report Date", using the current date and time.
Write the summary DataTable to the "Summary" sheet in the newly created Excel report file, including headers.
Write the in_AllTransactions DataTable to the "All Transactions" sheet in the same Excel report file, including headers.
Write the in_FlaggedTransactions DataTable to the "Fraud Cases" sheet in the same Excel report file, including headers.
Log a confirmation message indicating that the compliance report has been successfully generated and includes the file path.
